name: Space Thruster
description:
Space Thruster is a simple shoot 'em up game with power ups, alien spaceships to destroy and an endless quest to be the best.

You can have two different shots, a straight shot and a diagonal shot. Those can be upgraded to shoot up to 5 projectiles at the same time.

The more you progress, the harder the game becomes. With stronger enemies and more of them. Luckily, you can use a Magic Clock to slow down the enemy army, if you manage to find one.

You also have a Nuke, to destroy the entire enemy army in just a press of a button.

How long can you stay alive without being obliterated by your enemies?
